summary: TACHOMETER SURGES UPWARD BUT THE VEHICLE DOESN'T GO ANY FASTER AND I AM NOT PRESSING THE ACCELERATOR.  THEN SOME TIMES IT WILL DROP DRAMATICALLY.  FIRST VISIT DEALER SAID COULD NOT DUPLICATE, SECOND TRIP THEY REPLACED EGR VALVE.  IT IS BETTER BUT STILL DOES NOT DRIVE LIKE A NEW VEHICLE.*AK
